message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll still get great value from it.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Would it be possible to lower the price further to $100? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.
